data.text:
@Dominiq48917046 @missrobinson @Glaven1994 That's it. I'm drawing a line on my next RAT.

No way I'm gonna live through a global pandemic with no damn sick days and Netflix.
@oliver_adl @Glaven1994 I would help crowd source this.
@InvertedGuy17 @missrobinson @Glaven1994 I believe you can carry those over to the next financial year. But check with hr.
@jacob_633 @hammerh27 @Glaven1994 Oh come on. He’s a born liar and con-artist. Questioning his story isn’t ‘conspiracy’.
@jacob_633 @GroperBlue @Glaven1994 crackhead conspiracy theorists have entered the chat
@GroperBlue @hammerh27 @Glaven1994 I can’t stand the bloke but not everything he does or doesn’t  is a conspiracy

@jacob_633 @hammerh27 @Glaven1994 if you believe the story - everything is so contrived with #Morriscum If he has it, this RATs story will be just to cover his lard arse.  #ScottyFromPhotoOps #ScottyTheLardArse #ScottyDoesNothing
@missrobinson @Glaven1994 Hmmmm. This probably means I've had it and I didn't get to watch all the movies I put aside for my Covid week of skiving.
@InvertedGuy17 @Glaven1994 Nope. I tested negative with a RAT at night (symptomatic) and had a fever the next day and a nasty chesty cough. Other friends infected recently had the same
